refnamediv.refpurpose: Will run input through the neural network, returning an array of outputs, the number of which being equal to the number of neurons in the output layer.

listitem.para: a vector of double containing the value of the input parameters
a vector of double containing the value of the output estimations

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Will run input through the neural network, returning an array of outputs, the number of which being equal to the number of neurons in the output layer.
